item.description: Coloring for colorblindness # Prompt: Implement a color mapping application that helps people who are color blind see the colors around them. In order to assess this problem, first we need to understand colorblindness and later, pick one of the many forms this may manifest. What is colorblindness? # Color blindness is classified according to the number of color channels that are available to a person to conveying color information into: monochromacy, dichromacy and anomalous trichromacy.
